ExporterParameters Struct Reference

Detailed Description

structure holding configurable exporter parameters

Field Documentation

int ExporterParameters::AutoconnectInterval
 

Period in seconds for automatically connecting to active Collectors

ExporterCapabilities ExporterParameters::caps
 

int ExporterParameters::ConnectResponseTimeout
 

Period in seconds for receiving "Connect Response" message after connect message is sent

int ExporterParameters::DataAckSequenceInterval
 

Number of messages when the acknowledge must be sent by collector

int ExporterParameters::DataAckTimeInterval
 

Period in seconds when the acknowledge must be sent by collector

int ExporterParameters::KeepAliveInterval
 

Period in seconds for sending "Keep Alive" message

IPDR_IPAddress ExporterParameters::ProtocolLevelAddr
 

IP Address will be send to collector in connect message, if NULL wil be sent real socket address

int ExporterParameters::StatisticsInterval
 

Interval between stats report

int ExporterParameters::TemplateAckTimeout
 

Period in seconds for receiving "Final Template Acknowledge" by collector when switching to the new one. If the selected Collector does not send the acknowledge withing this interval, the connection is closed and exporter switches to another Collector

char* ExporterParameters::VendorString
 

Vendor specific string attached to the client (transmitter) (copied from IPDR_InitExporter(), using Util_StrDup() as needed).

int ExporterParameters::WaitBestCollectorTimeout
 

Period in seconds, the Exported supposed to wait Collectors to be connected, before choosing Collector for Active Session. This period starts counting after first "Connect" or "Connect Response" Message for specific Session in a case that all the Collectors are disconnected (including Startup)

int ExporterParameters::WindowTimeout
 

Timeout before changing server (collector) when no ACK is received (this used to also use the window size, but that code was removed as being a wrong design).
